mapper.insert:
insert into mcsw.master(college, university, master_major, type, score, remarks, user_id, create_time, update_time, bachelor_major, code) values
(#{entity.college}, #{entity.university}, #{entity.masterMajor}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.bachelorMajor}, #{entity.code})

insert into mcsw.master(college, university, master_major, type, score, remarks, user_id, create_time, update_time, bachelor_major, code) values
(#{entity.college}, #{entity.university}, #{entity.masterMajor}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.bachelorMajor}, #{entity.code})
on duplicate key update college = values(college) , university = values(university) , master_major = values(master_major) , type = values(type) , score = values(score) , remarks = values(remarks) , user_id = values(user_id) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , bachelor_major = values(bachelor_major) , code = values(code)
